definitions: (with reference to a lid or other object held in place by a spiral thread) unfasten or be unfastened by twisting

examples.text: Will unscrewed the cap from a metal flask
the spout usually unscrews or lifts off easily

shortDefinitions: unfasten or be unfastened by twisting

definitions: detach, open, or slacken (something) by removing or loosening the screws holding it in place

examples.text: he unscrewed the number plates from his old Renault

shortDefinitions: detach, open, or slacken something by removing or loosening screws holding it in place
